using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using AsyncGenerator.TestCases;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.AlwaysAwait.Input
{
	public partial class TestCase
	{
		public async Task SimpleVoidAsync()
		{
			await (SimpleFile.ReadAsync());
		}

		public async Task MultipleVoidAsync(bool value)
		{
			SimpleFile.Clear();
			if (value)
			{
				await (SimpleFile.ReadAsync());
			}
			else
			{
				await (SimpleFile.ReadAsync());
			}
		}

		public async Task<bool> SimpleRetrunAsync()
		{
			return await (SimpleFile.WriteAsync(""));
		}

		public async Task<bool> MultipleReturnsAsync(bool value)
		{
			SimpleFile.Clear();
			if (value)
			{
				return await (SimpleFile.WriteAsync("A"));
			}
			else
			{
				return await (SimpleFile.WriteAsync("B"));
			}
		}

		public async Task NestedVoidAsync()
		{
			await (SimpleVoidAsync());
		}

		public async Task<bool> NestedAsync()
		{
			return await (SimpleRetrunAsync());
		}

	}
}
